oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Original wills, Adams, William, 1808 March 24
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An original will of William Adams, dated September 23rd, 1807. Illustrates the first page of the document. It was “recorded in book No. 5 page 197” in the Davidson County Court on March 24th, 1808. Forms part of Record Group 16, Original Wills, 1780-1925.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Adams family
